result.name: supported-housing-in-cambridgeshire-peterborough-and-west-suffolk1
result.notes:
A data set identifying three main categories of supported housing across Cambridgeshire, Peterborough and West Suffolk: housing schemes for older people, people with disabilities and for homeless people.
This is an initial list of over 600 schemes (not individual properties) aimed at supporting our geo-location work.

organization.name: cambridgeshire-insight
organization.title: Cambridgeshire Insight
organization.description: The Cambridgeshire Insight Partnership is made up of public, health and community bodies to provide a shared research knowledge base for the Cambridgeshire area. It allows users an easy way to access and share data, information and research for deeper insights about their local area. See more at https://cambridgeshireinsight.org.uk

result.title: Supported housing in Cambridgeshire, Peterborough and West Suffolk

resources.description:
Excel file detailing more than 600 supported housing schemes in Cambridgeshire, Peterborough and West Suffolk.

Postcodes geocoded using Ordnance Survey Code-Point® Open and is subject to the Ordnance Survey data licence:

Your use of data is subject to terms at www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/opendata/licence.

Contains Ordnance Survey data © Crown copyright and database right 2017.

Contains Royal Mail data © Royal Mail copyright and database right 2017. Contains National Statistics data © Crown copyright and database right 2017.

Some geo-locations corrected, improving on the previous version published in February 2017.
